title: 'Good support; mouse pad size could be larger'
body: 'I liked the overall firmness and height of the gel support area. But for me when using the support with the wrist extending I found that I was running out of space on the mouse pad and the movement would have to be slightly constrained by me. Overall a good product but for larger hands like mine would have liked a slightly larger mouse pad area.'

title: 'Product stops working after 10 days'
body: 'In search of good mouse pad

title: 'Very comfortable to use. 100% recommend!'
body: I was facing constant wrist pain because of using my mouse for long hours. This product really helped and now I don't face any pain. It's comfortable to rest your wrist for long hours too and the gel retains shape. 10/10 would recommend to buy if you spend 5 days continuously using your mouse.

title: 'Good mousepad at this proce'
body: 'The memory foam in the hand rest is gel infused and feels supportive. Doesnt heat like a usual memory foam. Smooth fabric. Would recommend. Colour is not as described
column5: it is more of a coral pink than bubblegum pink.'

title: 'Long Term Review (2 years)'
body: Pros - 2 years going strong, no build quality issue. Comfy - Comfortable and Ergonomic. Quality Foam.  Cons - Can't think at this price.

title: 'A quality essential for people spending long hours using a mouse.'
body: 'I basically spend around 10 hours each day with a mouse in my hand. My previous pad while being very accurate (as needed) did not have wrist support
column5: and I started getting worn out carpals and wrist pain. This pad is really comfortable on the wrist
column6: has reasonably accuracy and smooth movement
column7: and looks are sleek. A good buy at this price!'
